headline: Chipotle introduces a value-focused, digital-exclusive family meal deal
summary: The ‘Build-Your-Own Chipotle’ offering feeds four to six people, allowing them to create any bowl, salad, or soft taco to their preferences

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: Chipotle Mexican Grill and Fortinet
summary: Chipotle and Fortinet are each down over 30% in 2025, but Zacks sees long-term strength as both stocks find support at key levels.

headline: CHIPOTLE INTRODUCES A WHOLE NEW WAY TO ORDER FOR A SMALL GROUP: BUILD-YOUR-OWN CHIPOTLE
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) today announced it will launch "Build-Your-Own Chipotle," a family meal offering intended to feed groups of four to six people, starting tomorrow, August 26. A digital-exclusive menu option, "Build-Your-Own Chipotle" is a shareable, customizable spread of real ingredients that can be ready for pickup in as little as 15 minutes.

headline: Chipotle’s Drone Delivery Rollout With Zipline Might Change The Case For Investing In CMG
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill recently announced a partnership with Zipline to offer autonomous drone delivery for digital orders in the greater Dallas area, beginning with a pilot at its Rowlett, TX location and intending to expand service and hours soon. This innovative approach leverages zero-emissions aircraft to provide faster, more convenient service, and positions Chipotle at the forefront of restaurant delivery technology advancements. We'll now examine how Chipotle's entry into drone-based...
